verses.roman:
ataeva tāra mukhe nā āise kṛṣṇa-nāma
'kṛṣṇa-nāma', 'kṛṣṇa-svarūpa'--duita 'samāna'

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; tāra mukhe—in their mouths; nā—not; āise—manifests; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa-svarūpa—the personality of the Lord; duita samāna—both identical.
translation: "The holy name of Kṛṣṇa is not manifest in their mouths because they are offenders unto Kṛṣṇa, the Supreme Personality of Godhead, who is identical with His holy name.
